name: King of Midtown NFT Tour Part 2: NYC Limited Edition Live Mint

metadata.name: Breathe #1/13
metadata.description:
She’s sitting at the edge of a pier, her feet gently swaying in the water. She watches the fish swim by, their movements slow and peaceful. The starry night sky overhead glows with quiet brilliance, reminding her of the vastness of the universe and the beauty of all that surrounds her.

At this moment, she finds solace in the stillness and tranquility of the night, a sense of calmness permeating her being. She feels connected to the natural world and its rhythms and finds comfort in her place within it.

The artwork evokes a sense of peaceful contemplation, inviting the viewer to take a moment to pause and appreciate the beauty and interconnectedness of all things, and the ways in which our lives are woven into the fabric of the cosmos.

“Breathe” encapsulates the sense of mindfulness and being fully present at the moment that the artwork evokes.
